import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Col, Row, Container } from "../components/Grid"; import Jumbotron from "../components/Jumbotron"; import API from "../utils/API"; class Detail extends Component { state = { plant: {} }; // When this component mounts, grab the book with the _id of this.props.match.params.id // e.g. localhost:3000/books/599dcb67f0f16317844583fc componentDidMount() { API.getBook(this.props.match.params.id) .then(res => this.setState({ plant: res.data })) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } render() { return (

{this.state.plant.Type} by {this.state.plant.Name}

Synopsis

  • Type:{this.state.plant.Type}
  • Name:{this.state.plant.Name}
  • Image: {this.state.plant.Image}
  • BotanicalName:{this.state.plant.BotanicalName}
  • Height: {this.state.plant.Height}
  • Spacing:{this.state.plant.Spacing}
  • Plant Spacing:{this.state.plant.PS}
  • Row Spacing: {this.state.plant.RS}
  • Depth:{this.state.plant.Depth}
  • Spread: {this.state.plant.Spread}
  • Sun Light:{this.state.plant.Light}
  • Yield:{this.state.plant.Yeild}
  • Foliage: {this.state.plant.Foliage}
  • Fruit:{this.state.plant.Fruit}
  • Maturity: {this.state.plant.Maturity}
  • Zone:{this.state.plant.Zone}
  • Germination:{this.state.plant.Germination}
  • Form: {this.state.plant.Form}
  • Flowers:{this.state.plant.Flowers}
  • Soil: {this.state.plant.Soil}
    • Zone: String, Germination: String, Form: String, Flowers: String, Soil: String, Growth: String, Seeds: String, Pruning: String, Comments: String, {this.state.plant.Comments}
‚Üê Back to Authors ); } } export default Detail; /* Type: String, Name: String, Image: String, BotanicalName: String, Height: String, Spacing: String, PS: Number, RS: Number, Depth: String, Spread: String, Light: String, Yield: String, Foliage: String, Fruit: String, Maturity: String, Zone: String, Germination: String, Form: String, Flowers: String, Soil: String, Growth: String, Seeds: String, Pruning: String, Comments: String, */
